item.title: Report E-2025020054
item.description:
Report E-2025020054

Identified by scraper @ 2025-02-08T03:31:42+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2025-01-31
  • City: HENDERSON
  • State: CO
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: R & L CARRIERS, INC.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 5000
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: On January 31, 2025, one (1) 55-gallon drum of sodium hydroxide was punctured and released approximately three (3) gallons of product to the dock floor and pallet. R+L Carriers retained Cura Emergency Services, LC who dispatched a crew from EnviroServe (ES) to remediate the site. The damaged drum was overpacked in one (1) 95-gallon drum. The crew utilized neutralizers, absorbents, and hand tools to remediate the site. All impacted material was containerized in one (1) 55-gallon drum.
